name: Awesome FPS
description: HEY YOU! Are you bored of playing the same old boring fps game? I bet you are, the industry is filled with boring, basic, generic, and redundant fps games. Every year the market is flooded with the same repackaged releases. But finally something new is on the table for you. In the awesome fps game you get to go through multiple different and unique levels to complete the objective of surviving the level. WIth a wide range of landscapes, environment, and places to survive you won’t ever get bored. Each level will have enemies that you have to survive from. These enemies are unique and new to this game as they were designed in house. If you were looking for something new and fun to play now is your time.
